price: Divulga lo que se te ordena [públicamente] y no te preocupes por los idólatras.
arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'daʿ bimā tu'maru wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-mush'rikīna
